title: How to Replace a Kitchen Faucet (with FAQ)
content: Full instructions plus answers to common questions...

steps.name: Shut off water
steps.text: Turn off water supply valves under the sink.

steps.name: Disconnect lines
steps.text: Use wrench to disconnect supply lines.

steps.name: Remove old faucet
steps.text: Loosen mounting nuts and lift out the faucet.

steps.name: Install new faucet
steps.text: Seat gasket, tighten nuts, and connect lines.

steps.name: Test
steps.text: Turn water on and check for leaks.

questions.question: Do I need plumber's putty?
questions.answer: Many modern faucets include a gasket; check manufacturer guidance.

questions.question: What if the supply lines don't match?
questions.answer: Use appropriate adapters or replace lines to match faucet threads.
